name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Amazon sort by Reviews Count (US UK CA MX)

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automate sort products by number of reviews, filter title to match your search words, then sort results by price per count.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Amazon Sort by Reviews Count (US UK CA MX)" is a powerful Chrome extension designed to streamline your shopping experience. With this tool, you can:

Automate Loading: Automatically load all pages of search results without manual clicking.
Smart Grouping: Organize and group search results for easier navigation.
Advanced Filtering: Filter results based on specific search terms to find exactly what youâ€™re looking for.
Custom Sorting: Sort products by price or price per count, making it easy to compare and choose the best deals.
Save time and optimize your Amazon search experience!
